items.name: Raw Oysters

items.description: Cajun seasoning, served with cocktail sauce.

items.name: Kickin' Wings

items.description: (5 pieces) Crispy battered white fish served with tartar sauce and Cajun fries.

items.description: (6 pieces) Whole shrimp wrapped in wonton, fried, and served with Cajun fries.

items.name: Sweet Potato Fries
items.description: fried and served with buttercream.

items.name: Fried Calamari

items.name: Fried Fish Tacos
items.description: (3 per order) crispy battered white fish served on corn tortillas and topped with pico de gallo.

items.name: Grilled Shrimp Tacos
items.description: (3 per order) Cajun marinated grilled shrimp served on corn tortillas and topped with pico de gallo.

items.name: Garlic Noodles
items.description: Sautéed in garlic butter.

items.name: Kickin' Chowder
items.description: baby clams, potato, white-cream based chowder, served with oyster crackers.

items.name: KC Gumbo
items.description: chicken-pork sausages, shrimp, corn, celery, okra, tomato, bell peppers (served with or without rice; mild or spicy).

items.name: Seafood Scampi
items.description: scallops, shrimp, clams, and mussels in a creamy garlic white wine sauce; served with pita bread.

items.name: Seafood Alfredo Pasta
